ISSUE.TITLE: [Design] Select Files tab content on the Asset Field
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### **Steps to reproduce** - Go to an entry with a media input - Click on Add an asset - Go to the selected files tab - See that there is an issue and 2 sentences should be spaced ### **Expected behavior** The 2 sentences should be split. ### **Screenshots** ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/2526a709-56ad-47a8-a451-223c502afe40)
